name: Doggy Adventures
description:
The story.

A small puppy decides to help children who have lost their toys. You will have to dive into the adventures on behalf of the dog and find all the toys hidden in various locations. Find them all! You will see a variety of unique locations that will not let you get bored during the game. Future updates will continue to delight you with new content even after the game is released.

Features.

  • Beautiful graphics.
  • Pleasant sounds.
  • Wonderful atmosphere.
  • Unique experience.

storkyproduct.

  • I am a solo game developer, and it is my second project.
  • "Doggy Adventures" is 2,5 D platformer with pretty cool graphics, I think :D.
  • This game - exactly that game, which I wanted to create.
  • Hope you like it!
